articles.content: Boston Celtics guard Marcus Smart, the leading defender on the NBA's leading defense, believes he is the Defensive Player of the Year. So, too, does Mikal Bridges, the Phoenix Suns' fourth-year wing … [+9358 chars]

articles.content:

articles.description: Russell Wilson, Davante Adams and Tyreek Hill have all been traded, and plenty of other big names have found new homes. Here’s how the league shakes out right now.
